about_the_game:
Large map turn based mobile, arrange troops, occupy favorable resource points, and buy troops.

The encounter of the two armies will trigger the battle scene. Each team has five kinds of forces. Choosing the appropriate strategy to annihilate the opponent can win.

A variety of random events affect player forces and deployment.

1: The rebel army randomly occupies a territory and destroys the troops on the territory to generate a third-party force.

2: Thunderstorm: the troops cannot move due to thunderstorm.

3: Defection: some troops may surrender their territory to each other.

4: Reinforcements: reinforcements will arrive in the fixed turn.

5: Earthquake: railway transportation cannot be used for 1 round
